thread.title: Robert Becker
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Robert Becker

author: Robert Becker
title: Robert Becker
text: I've been a client for many years, but, fortunately, only had to use the services twice, once each for auto and home. Both times my claim was handled quickly and competently, with minimal disruption to my schedule.
